messageBody:
Hi,
I don't want to add each Test***.class one by one - either to the
TestSuite in the source code, or in the ant .xml file...I want
something to automatically pick up all Test*.class in the specified
package...JUnit is capable of doing that? Or I need to write my own
piece of code for that?

I actually looked into writing my own "class-picker"...but didn't
find out the APIs to do that? Looked in both Package and Class
classes and reflector package...

Anyone any idea?

Thanks,
-wleana
